content.description: Sit start a couple of feet to the left of Chimpstronaut on a good 90-degree feature that runs up to the top of the boulder. Use the crack and holds around the edge to reach the top.
content.location: Sit starts a couple of feet to the left of Chimpstronaut and works straight up to the top.

content.description: Sit start a couple of feet to the left of Dirty Space Crack on the left-hand arete of the Space Junk boulder. Put your left hand on the arete and your right hand in a good slightly-sloping crack on the vertical face. Work up the arete to the top.
content.location: Sit start a couple of feet to the left of Dirty Space Crack on the left-hand arete of the Space Junk boulder and work up the arete.

content.description: Sit start in the horizontal crack on two good edge jugs with a very high right foot. Dyno straight up to the highest point of the boulder to catch a sloper jug. The dyno is very large and the grade would increase grade substantially for anyone under 5' 6".
content.location: Sit start in the middle of the vertical face of Space Junk directly below the highest point.

content.description: One of the larger boulders with a very flat vertical face featuring cool holds. There is a stellar one move dyno problem in the very middle called "Chimpstronaut".
